title: Stock Futures Rise Ahead of Retail Data, Powell Talk
sub_head: Technology stocks emerged as early winners in the premarket session
body:
U.S. stock futures rose, rebounding from a choppy session Monday, as investors grappled with concerns about the economic outlook amid high inflation.
S&P 500 futures rose 1.8% Tuesday, while contracts for the Dow Jones Industrial Average added 1.3%. Futures for the tech-heavy Nasdaq-100 jumped 2.4%. On Monday, major U.S. indexes finished in mixed territory after a late-session selloff that pushed the Nasdaq Composite down 1.2%.
